name.ca: Bloc de Notes per Favorits - AnnoPad
name.es,es_419: Bloc de Notas Específico URL - Annopad
name.ja: ブックマークのメモ帳 - AnnoPad
name.pt_BR,pt_PT: Bloco de Notas URL Específico - AnnoPad

short.am,ar,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,fa,fil,he,ml: With this tool, you can create notes for specific website addresses.
short.bg: С този инструмент можете да създавате бележки за конкретни адреси в Интернет.
short.bn: এই টুল দিয়ে আপনি নির্দিষ্ট ওয়েবসাইটের ঠিকানার জন্য নোট তৈরি করতে পারেন.
short.ca: Amb aquesta eina, pot crear notes per a adreces de llocs web específics.
short.cs: Pomocí tohoto nástroje můžete vytvářet poznámky pro konkrétní adres internetových stránek.
short.da: Med dette værktøj kan du oprette noter til bestemte hjemmesideadresser.
short.de: Mit diesem Tool können Sie Notizen für bestimmte Web-Adressen erstellen.
short.el: Με αυτό το εργαλείο, μπορείτε να δημιουργήσετε σημειώσεις για συγκεκριμένες διευθύνσεις ιστοσελίδα.
short.es,es_419: Con esta herramienta, puede crear notas para direcciones de sitios web específicos.
short.et: Selle tööriista abil saate luua märkmeid konkreetse veebisaidi aadress.
short.fi: Tämän työkalun avulla voit luoda muistiinpanoja tiettyjen sivustojen osoitteet.
short.fr: Avec cet outil, vous pouvez créer des notes pour des adresses spécifiques du site.
short.gu: આ સાધન સાથે, તમે ચોક્કસ વેબસાઇટ સરનામા માટે નોંધો બનાવી શકો છો.
short.hi: इस उपकरण के साथ, आप विशिष्ट वेबसाइट के पते के लिए नोट्स बना सकते हैं.
short.hr: Pomoću ovog alata, možete stvoriti bilješke za određene adrese web stranica.
short.hu: Ezzel az eszközzel hozhat létre jegyzeteket az egyes webcímeket.
short.id: Dengan tool ini, Anda dapat membuat catatan untuk alamat situs web tertentu.
short.it: Con questo strumento, è possibile creare note per specifici indirizzi di siti web.
short.ja: このツールを使用すると、特定のウェブサイトのアドレスのためのノートを作成することができます。
short.kn: ಈ ಉಪಕರಣವನ್ನು, ನೀವು ನಿರ್ದಿಷ್ಟ ವೆಬ್ಸೈಟ್ ವಿಳಾಸಗಳನ್ನು ಟಿಪ್ಪಣಿಗಳು ರಚಿಸಬಹುದು.
short.ko: 이 도구를 사용하면 특정 웹 사이트 주소에 대한 메모를 생성 할 수 있습니다.
short.lt: Su šiuo įrankiu, galite kurti užrašus konkrečių interneto adresus.
short.lv: Ar šo rīku, jūs varat izveidot piezīmes konkrētām tīmekļa vietņu adreses.
short.mr: या उपकरणाद्वारे, आपण विशिष्ट वेबसाइट पत्ते नोट्स तयार करू शकता.
short.ms: Dengan alat ini, anda boleh membuat nota untuk alamat laman web tertentu.
short.nl: Met deze tool kunt u nota's voor specifieke website adressen aanmaken.
short.no: Med dette verktøyet kan du lage notater for spesifikke web-adresser.
short.pl: Za pomocą tego narzędzia można tworzyć notatki dla określonych adresów internetowych.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Com esta ferramenta, você pode criar notas para endereços de sites específicos.
short.ro: Cu acest instrument, puteți crea note de adrese de site-ul web specifice.
short.ru: С помощью этого инструмента можно создавать заметки для конкретных адресов веб-сайтов.
short.sk: Pomocou tohto nástroja môžete vytvárať poznámky pre konkrétny adries internetových stránok.
short.sl: S tem orodjem lahko ustvarite zapiske za posebne naslovi spletnih strani.
short.sr: Са овом алатком, можете да креирате белешке за одређене веб адресе.
short.sv: Med detta verktyg kan du skapa anteckningar för specifika webbadresser.
short.sw: Pamoja na chombo hiki, unaweza kuunda maelezo kwa anwani tovuti maalum.
short.ta: இந்த கருவி மூலம், நீங்கள் குறிப்பிட்ட இணைய முகவரிகளை குறிப்புகளை உருவாக்க முடியும்.
short.te: ఈ సాధనం, మీరు నిర్దిష్ట వెబ్ సైట్ చిరునామాలు కోసం గమనికలు సృష్టించవచ్చు.
short.th: ด้วยเครื่องมือนี้คุณสามารถสร้างบันทึกสำหรับที่อยู่เว็บไซต์ที่เฉพาะเจาะจง
short.tr: Bu araç ile belirli web sitesi adresleri için notlar oluşturabilirsiniz.
short.uk: За допомогою цього інструменту ви можете створювати нотатки для конкретних адрес веб-сайтів.
short.vi: Với công cụ này, bạn có thể tạo các ghi chú cho các địa chỉ trang web cụ thể.
short.zh_CN,zh_TW: 有了这个工具，您可以创建笔记的具体网址。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
With Annopad, easily create/save/export notes for all your bookmarked sites!    


This notepad / bookmark hybrid is a must for any web savvy individual.  Our userbase includes anyone from coders and programmers, to web design, content researchers and lifehacking.  The next generation notepad has arrived and ready to assist you! 

Are you a growthhacker or lifehacker? Doing research online?  Remember important topics by having Annopad on your side and taking useful, URL specific notes on your research.  Our innovative notepad will help you remember all the web pages that you were doing research on!

Annopad can also be used for social bookmarking!





Have any questions or recommendations? 


Shoot us an email at 

Hello@Annopad.com  

Or catch us on social media: 

Twitter: @Anno_pad
Facebook: www.facebook.com/Annopad
long.en,en_AU:
With this tool, you can create notes for specific website addresses.

Easily create/save/export notes for all your bookmarked sites!    


This notepad / bookmark hybrid is a must for any web savvy individual.  Our userbase includes anyone from coders and programmers, to web design, content researchers and lifehacking.  The next generation notepad has arrived and ready to assist you!

Are you a growthhacker or lifehacker? Doing research online?  Remember important topics by having Annopad on your side and taking useful, URL specific notes on your research.  Our innovative notepad will help you remember all the web pages that you were doing research on!

Annopad can also be used for social bookmarking!

Product Update:

Annopad is getting some new bells and whistles. We will be working hard to add on new features that have been requested.

Or catch us on social media:

Twitter: @Anno_pad
Facebook: www.facebook.com/Annopad
long.lt:
Annotate your important notes with the easy to use, URL specific notepad!


This notepad / bookmark hybrid is a must for any web savvy individual.  With Annopad, you can now create/save/export URL specific notes!  The next generation notepad has arrived and ready to assist you! 

Doing research online?  Remember important topics by having Annopad on your side and taking useful, URL specific notes on your research.  Our innovative notepad will help you remember all the web pages that you were doing research on!


Have any questions or recommendations?  Shoot us an email at Annopadextension@gmaill.com  


Twitter: @Annopad_extension
Facebook: www.facebook.com/annopad
